title: Executive Order 8742-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of July 9, 1910, Creating Coal Land Withdrawal, Montana No. 1
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, the Executive order of July 9, 1910, creating Coal Land Withdrawal, Montana No. 1, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 22 N., R. 51 E., all except SE¼SE¼, sec. 8.
T. 21 N., R. 53 E., all except lot 1, sec. 30.
T. 21 N., R. 54 E., all except SW¼, sec. 3.
T. 23 N., R. 54 E., all except SW¼SE¼, sec. 28..
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8742-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of July 9, 1910, Creating Coal Land Withdrawal, Montana No. 1 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372090
